mapper.select: SELECT P_NO, P_NAME, P_PRICE, P_INFO, P_MAINIMG, P_SUBIMG, P_COUNT, P_CATE, P_QTY, P_PRICE2, P_BUY, P_STATUS, P_C_NAME FROM PRODUCT
mapper.update: UPDATE PRODUCT SET P_COUNT=#{count} WHERE P_NO=#{productNo}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM PRODUCT ORDER BY P_COUNT DESC) WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 4
SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM PRODUCT ORDER BY P_NO DESC) WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 4

SELECT S_DAY, S_USER, S_P_NO, COUNT(S_C_QTY) AS S_C_QTY, P_PRICE, P_NAME FROM SELL, PRODUCT WHERE SUBSTR(S_DAY,4,2)=#{month} AND SELL.S_P_NO = PRODUCT.P_NO GROUP BY S_DAY, S_USER, S_P_NO, S_C_QTY, P_PRICE, P_NAME ORDER BY S_DAY DESC

SELECT S_DAY, S_USER, S_P_NO, COUNT(S_C_QTY) AS S_C_QTY, P_PRICE, P_NAME FROM SELL, PRODUCT WHERE SUBSTR(S_DAY,7,2)=#{date} AND SELL.S_P_NO = PRODUCT.P_NO GROUP BY S_DAY, S_USER, S_P_NO, S_C_QTY, P_PRICE, P_NAME ORDER BY S_DAY DESC

SELECT S_DAY, S_USER, S_P_NO, COUNT(S_C_QTY) AS S_C_QTY, P_PRICE, P_NAME FROM SELL, PRODUCT WHERE SUBSTR(S_DAY,7,2)=#{weekDay}-6 OR SUBSTR(S_DAY,7,2)=#{weekDay}-5 OR SUBSTR(S_DAY,7,2)=#{weekDay}-4 OR SUBSTR(S_DAY,7,2)=#{weekDay}-3 OR SUBSTR(S_DAY,7,2)=#{weekDay}-2 OR SUBSTR(S_DAY,7,2)=#{weekDay}-1 OR SUBSTR(S_DAY,7,2)=#{weekDay} AND SELL.S_P_NO = PRODUCT.P_NO GROUP BY S_DAY, S_USER, S_P_NO, S_C_QTY, P_PRICE, P_NAME ORDER BY S_DAY DESC
mapper.insert: insert into client(c_no, c_name, c_tel) values(client_seq.nextval, #{c_name}, #{c_tel})
